================================================================================

3. Tap "üì• Import JSON File"

‚ö†Ô∏è Import REPLACES all current data (warns first!)

================================================================================
PHOTOS
================================================================================

ADDING:
- Tap photo area in Wizard form
- Choose "Take Photo" or "Choose from Library"
- Photo previews in form
- Saves as part of system data

LIMITS:
- Max 2MB per photo (app warns if larger)
- Photos stored as base64 in JSON
- Recommended: Keep under 1MB

TIPS:
- Use landscape orientation
- Compress large photos before adding
- Photos export with JSON file

================================================================================
TROUBLESHOOTING
================================================================================

PROBLEM: Can't add to home screen (iOS)
FIX: Must use Safari, not Chrome/Firefox

PROBLEM: iPhone won't open HTML from Files app
FIX: Apple blocks this - use email attachment instead
     Or see iOS_WORKAROUND_GUIDE.txt for 5 solutions

PROBLEM: Photos won't upload
FIX: Check size (max 2MB), try smaller photo

PROBLEM: Export not working
FIX: Check Downloads folder for haven_data_*.json

PROBLEM: Map won't show
FIX: Tap "Regenerate Map", wait for systems to load

PROBLEM: Data disappeared
FIX: Check if different browser, cannot recover without export

PROBLEM: App won't open
FIX: Refresh page, clear cache, redownload HTML
